title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Transitioning Face-to-Face Science Courses to Online: Team-Based Approaches and Individual

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners design and execute team-based science experiments in online environments to enhance collaborative problem-solving skills
Learners reflectively evaluate their understanding of science concepts through personal narrative analysis and propose improvement strategies
Learners systematically acquire core theories of science subjects through asynchronous learning activities based on an LMS

Learners can analyze three sets of scientific data using digital tools such as Python (Pandas, Matplotlib) and Google Colab in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, generate five or more types of visualization outputs (graphs/dashboards), and achieve a score of 3 or higher (out of 5) based on peer evaluation and instructor rubrics (accuracy, creativity, practicality).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
